about_the_game:
Dive into a world of epic fantasy in 'Tits and Shadows', an exciting turn-based RPG that will take you on an unforgettable journey.
In this game, you'll assume the role of a brave adventurer named Hero, whose resurrection comes with a divine purpose: to confront the dreadful threat of the demon queen Putana and her army of monsters.



A man cannot defeat evil alone, and in this occasion, you'll be accompanied by these powerful women of valor.


Bec Santus is a fearless paladin whose determination to fight for justice is inspired by her grandfather's captivating stories.
With her imposing presence on the battlefield and her steadfast sense of duty, she stands as a pillar of courage and honor, ready to face any challenge in her tireless quest for a better world.


Haunted by her past, Wendy Woods bears the weight of her Wendigo curse.
Despite this, she's determined to prove that she's not a monster, bravely battling against her own nature and facing the challenges that cross her path.
Her aura of solitude hides a heart full of determination and the pursuit of redemption.


Cherry Baba, the Slime Queen, radiates undeniable power, yet harbors doubts and the need to prove her worth to herself and others.
Her journey is not only one of leadership but also of self-discovery and inner empowerment.


Lisa Evergreen, known to many as "Lisa the Merciless," is an intriguing figure in the world of shadows.
Her keen cunning and undeniable business acumen have earned her a fearsome reputation. However, beneath her unflappable facade beats a proud heart.
Despite her inclination for money and gains, Lisa is not unfamiliar with the complexities of loyalty and honor.


Gabriel, a replica of her divine namesake, represents an earthly manifestation of the celestial. While her form is more "human," her essence is an inexhaustible source of mystery and wisdom.
Through the journey alongside you, Gabriel will not only explore the world around her but also her own being.



"Tits and Shadows" goes beyond being merely an erotic game. We take pride in presenting the following features that make this game a unique experience:

**More Than 4 Hours of Immersive Content:**
Embark on an epic journey that will take you through a rich and diverse world, filled with challenges, secrets, and unforgettable discoveries.

**Classic Turn-Based RPG:**
Immerse yourself in the nostalgia of turn-based gameplay, where each action is carefully chosen before the action is unleashed, allowing you to strategically plan your moves.


**God Mode:**
If you prefer not to engage in combat, use God Mode to enjoy everything else the game has to offer. Immerse yourself in the story, explore the world, and uncover secrets without worrying about battle encounters.


**High-Quality Erotic Artwork:**
Explore a wide variety of high-quality erotic illustrations that complement the story and characters. Each image is carefully crafted to capture the essence of each character and scene.


**Unlockable Image Gallery:**
Unlock an image gallery as you progress through the game, allowing you to relive your favorite moments and delve deeper into the visually captivating world of "Tits and Shadows."


**Constant and Free Updates:**
We are committed to keeping the game fresh and exciting with regular updates that will add additional content, improvements, and new experiences for players, all at no additional cost.

**Intellectual Challenges and Intriguing Missions:**
Solve clever puzzles and undertake challenging missions that will test your skills and reward you with exciting discoveries and valuable rewards.

**Free Additional Combat Allies:**
Expand your battle options with additional combat allies who will join your cause throughout the story.

content_descriptors.notes:
Disclaimer:

This game contains adult themes and content that may not be suitable for all ages. All characters with sex scenes in this title are 21 years of age and above!

Themes in this game include:

> Murder, abuse, cannibalism.

> Risqué outfits, sexual comments and lewd situations

> Full female, transgender and male nudity and sex

> Strong language and alcohol

> Dubious consent

name: Tits and Shadows

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel Celeron G5905
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: UHD Intel® 610
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek ALC1220
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel Pentium G6405
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: UHD Intel® 610
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek ALC1220

reviews:
“It is a decent title within the H or adult catalog, 7/10. The artwork itself won me over, as it is unique and diverse. Additionally, unlike similar titles, this one is more polished, and considering the price at which it is offered, it is more than a fair acquisition.”
7/10 – ♥ Lady Kaiser ♥

“It's cheap and the quality of the game is great, so I don't see any cons. With this level of configuration and gameplay at this price, I think I can only recommend it.”
kerakera
short_description: Tits and Shadows is a captivating turn-based RPG that seamlessly blends thrilling battles, intricate puzzles, and tantalizing adult content. Immerse yourself in a world teeming with diverse enemies, intriguing NPCs, and engaging quests.

*languages with full audio support
